sentences.sContent: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.sCn: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.sContent: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.sCn: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.sContent: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.sCn: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

trans.tranOther: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely
